about_the_game:
Take command of a powerful army and liberate our planet's resources.

This free DEMO version provides access to one campaign mission and one 4-player skirmish map.

Purchase the game to play through a 21-mission campaign and continue the fight on 14 unique skirmish maps.

Build your base however you want. Construct powerful units, research new technology and enhance your weaponry. Discover hidden technologies and control experimental weapons. Deploy tactical strikes and support your army with battlefield abilities.

Intuitive player controls with classic RTS features and feel.

Endeavor is an evolving passion project. Features and content will be added over time. Such as, two alternative game modes: Tower Defense and Survival, a third faction, additional skirmish maps and more.

Thanks for playing!

name: Endeavor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080 or better
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take command of the world's military elite and liberate planetary resources. Fabricate bases, train soldiers, build a mechanized army and rid the planet of powerful enemy combatants and mysterious alien threats.
